metadata.name: NTRVL CROSS 2
metadata.description:
NTRVL CROSS 2 is a composition created by overlaying NTRVL BASIC and NTRVL LINEAR.

NTVRL BASIC is a composition divided into sixteen same-sized squares. 
NTRVL LINEAR is a composition divided into sixteen same-sized rectangles.

Both compositions have a shortest beat of one frame, with increments increasing gradually (number of frames per beat) from 1 frame to 25 frames and back to 2 frames (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, …, 23, 24, 25, 24, 23,…, 5, 4, 3, 2), per one back frame and per one white, starting again with 1 frame. Forming a perfect loop of 1295 frames, or 00:00:51:20.

2160 x2160
25fps
1295 frames, or 00:00:51:20
H.264
Michael Hughes, 2022
